EmailTemplate.name: Synthio_Cold_Nurture_1.Synthio_Cold_Nurture_1_Email_1_v2
EmailTemplate.subject: Workload Automation for the Hybrid Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Today's problems cannot be solved with yesterday’s solutions. The challenges that arise from the complexity of cloud and virtual environments are beyond human scale. They require an autonomic decision-engine like the Turbonomic platform. Check out our video <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/smart-workload-automation-for-hybrid-cloud-with-turbonomic]]> to learn more.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/smart-workload-automation-for-hybrid-cloud-with-turbonomic]]>
Through full-stack automation, powered by a trustworthy decision-engine, Turbonomic workload automation for hybrid cloud makes workloads “SMART” (self-manage in real-time), to assure application performance while increasing infrastructure utilization and efficiency – all while maintaining compliance with business policies and goals.
Learn more <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo?utm_id=70157000001bY1tAAE]]>about how we can help.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
